net.codemusic.smartears
Class BasicAnswer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.codemusic.smartears.BasicAnswer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, IAnswer
public class BasicAnswer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAnswer

The BasicAnswer class models any answer that can be viewed as a two dimensional array of integers (MIDI values). This would include things like intervals, melodies (of equal rhythmic duration to each note), scales, chords, and chord progressions.

Constructor Summary
BasicAnswer(int[][] structure, IScoreManager manager)
          Creates a Basic Answer with the supplied array as its structure
